data.text: Wo mu, Ao Awurade, na manya hintabea;
Yɛ aso ma me,
Sɛ woyɛ me botan ne mʼaban enti,
Gye me firi afidie a wɔasum me no mu,
Wo nsam na mede me kra hyɛ;
Mekyiri wɔn a wɔsom abosom huhuo;
Mʼani bɛgye na madi ahurisie wɔ wo dɔ mu,
Woamfa me amma ɔtamfoɔ no
Hu me mmɔbɔ, Ao Awurade, ɛfiri sɛ me ho yera me;
Ateeteeɛ rete me nkwa so
Mʼatamfoɔ nyinaa enti,
Obiara werɛ afiri me te sɛ deɛ mawuo;
Mete dodoɔ no nsekuro.
Nanso, mede me ho ato wo so, Ao Awurade;
Me mmerɛ wɔ wo nsam
Te wʼanim kyerɛ wo ɔsomfoɔ;
Mma mʼanim ngu ase, Ao Awurade,
Mua atorofoɔ ano,
Wo papayɛ dɔɔso,
Wode wɔn sie wʼanim banbɔ mu
Ayɛyi nka Awurade!
Mebɔɔ huboa no, mekaa sɛ:
Monnɔ Awurade, mo a moyɛ nʼahotefoɔ nyinaa!
Monhyɛ den na momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam,
